description: Young and impetuous, and also a little arrogant at times, but an aspiring Feng Shui mistress from Hong Kong. As granddaughter of the powerful magician http://anidb.net/ch25802 [Avalanche Wong], and probably related to guild magician http://anidb.net/ch25782 [Genvara Cheng] (whose intelligent sword Jesso she wields as his successor) she can apply elemental magic (fire and water).
name: Lum Cheng
